name: Wazoku
overview:
Wazoku is an idea management company who believes in the power of great ideas and helps businesses of all sizes to uncover, filter and prioritise great ideas.

Wazoku’s core platform is Idea Spotlight a web-based idea management tool that captures, filters and prioritises the ideas generated within a business or community. Whether ideas for new revenue streams, marketing campaigns, sources of new customers or ways to improve efficiency, Idea Spotlight lets everyone submit and collaborate on ideas with an equal voice. The challenge function can be used to encourage ideas to help solve a specific business problem. Idea Spotlight makes idea management social. People can share ideas with colleagues, nominate reviewers and decision-makers, vote on ideas and submit questions and comments. Idea Spotlight makes sure that ideas don’t get lost or forgotten - it learns who the experts and decision-makers are on a given topic and helps relevant ideas find these people and lead them towards a conclusion.
